attributes.action: instruct the chancellor of the exchequor to bring in a windfall tax of 90% on all staff employee bonuses above £5,000 for the years 2009 and 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To apply to staff employed by  all Banks, and all other staff whose Company / Organisation falls under the auspices of the Financial services regulator. To be applicable to any and all bonuses to be paid in both the financial years 2008/9 & 2009/10
